full_title_(бүтэн_гарчиг): *, ,CHOS SKYONG DREGS PA LCAM SRING LA TSOGS MCHOD 'BUL BA'I TSUL BZHUGS SO, ,
colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @003A *, ,(CHOS SKYONG LCAM SRING GI TSOGS MCHOD 'BUL BA'I PHYIR BDE BA 'DI NI TSEN WANG GI MNGA' 'BANGS TSUL KHRIMS RNAM DAG MI PHYED PA'I DAD PA LDAN PA SGYUR GNAS PA DGE SLONG BLO BZANG SHES RAB DANG, GSO RTZIS KYI BLO RIG DNG LDAN PA DEM CHI BLO BZANG NGAG DBANG DANG, DGE SLONG BLO BZANG SANGS RGYAS RNAMS NAN TAN GYIS BSKUL BA'I NGO BSRUNG BA'I PHYIR DU, BYANG PHYOGS BSTAN PA'I GSAL BYED DZA YA PAndI TA MTSAN GZHAN BLO BZANG SNYAN GRAGS DGE LEGS RNAM RGYAL DPAL BZANG POS SLOB MA'I THA SHAL BA BLO BZANG DPAL MGON MING CAN GYIS CHOS SKYONG LCAMS SRING GZHAN LA TSOGS MCHOD LA THAMS CAD 'BUL BA'I CHO GA MI MTHONG ZHING, BLA MA YI DAM RANMS KYIS TSOGS MCHOD RNAMS YE SHES KYIS 'GREL NAS BRIS PA'I 'DI LHAG, ,MA DAG DANG TSUL MIN PA'I NYES SKYON GZHAN LA THAMS CAD BLA MA LHA TSOGS DANG, KHYAD PAR CHOS SKYONG LCAM SRING 'KHOR BCAS LA BZOD PAR GSOL, SGRIB PAR MI 'GYUR BA MDZAD DU GSOL, GAL TE LEGS CHA CUNG ZAD YOD NA DES BDAG SOGS SEMS CAN THAMS CAD KYI DAM TSIG NYAMS PAR SDIG SGRIB RNAMS BYANG ZHING DAG NAS, BSTAN 'GRO'I PHAN DON DU MCHOG THUN GYI DNGOS GRUB THOB PA'I RGYU RU BSNGO'O, ,)
author_simple: BLO BZANG DPAL MGON MING CAN,
